scope.definition_of_done: A responsive landing page with contact form, deployed to production

milestones.title: Project setup and basic structure
milestones.acceptance_criteria: HTML file created with proper document structure, CSS and JS files linked, basic layout wireframe implemented in code, project folder organized

milestones.title: Responsive design and styling
milestones.acceptance_criteria: Landing page is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop, CSS styling is consistent and visually appealing, navigation menu works on all screen sizes

milestones.title: Contact form functionality
milestones.acceptance_criteria: Contact form with name, email, and message fields is functional, form validates input (email format, required fields), form submission provides user feedback (success/error message)

milestones.title: Deployment to production
milestones.acceptance_criteria: Landing page deployed to a hosting service (e.g., Netlify, Vercel, GitHub Pages), all assets load correctly, contact form submissions are received, page passes basic accessibility checks
